languages.text: "Я же стану твоим проводником на этом пути. Помогу войти в медитативное состояние, познать себя... Конечно, если ты мне позволишь. Погружение в пучины собственной души — процесс глубоко сокровенный, но без меня сделать этого не получится". {n}Ирлиэт задумчиво смахивает прядь рыжих волос с лица.{/n} "И я обещаю тебе, элантах, что не стану судить. Ни тебя, ни твой мир, ни то, что в нем происходит. В нем мы увидим лишь то, что захочешь ты".

"And I will be your guide on this journey. I will help you to enter the meditative state, to get to know yourself... Of course, that is if you let me. Immersing yourself in your soul is a deeply intimate process, but you will not be able to do it without me." {n}Yrliet thoughtfully brushes a strand of red hair away from her face.{/n} "And I promise you, elantach, that I will not judge you — you, your world, or anything that takes place inside it. We will see only what you want to see."
languages.original_text: "Я же стану твоим проводником на этом пути. Помогу войти в медитативное состояние, познать себя... Конечно, если ты мне позволишь. Погружение в пучины собственной души — процесс глубоко сокровенный, но без меня сделать этого не получится". {n}Ирлиэт задумчиво смахивает прядь рыжих волос с лица.{/n} "И я обещаю тебе, элантах, что не стану судить. Ни тебя, ни твой мир, ни то, что в нем происходит. В нем мы увидим лишь то, что захочешь ты".

traits.locale_text: "And I will become your guide on this journey. I will help you to enter the meditative state, get to know yourself... Of course, if you will let me. Diving into the depths of one's soul is a deeply intimate process, but you won't be able to do it without me." {n}Yrliet thoughtfully brushes a strand of red hair from her face.{/n} "And I promise you, elantach, that I won't judge you. Not you, not your world, not what takes place inside it. We will see there only that you will want to see."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

Immersing yourself in your soul is a deeply intimate process, but you will not be able to do it without me." {n}Yrliet thoughtfully brushes a strand of red hair away from her face.{/n} "And I promise you, elantach, that I will not judge you — you, your world, or anything that takes place inside it. traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “在这场旅途中，我会成为引领你的向导。我会帮助你进入冥想状态，学习如何了解你自己……当然，假如你愿意的话。浸入灵魂是非常私密的行为，但如果没有我的帮助，你一个人是做不到的。”{n}伊莉耶特伸出手，拨开了垂到额前的一缕红发。{/n}“我答应你，外界人。我不会随意评判你和你的世界，或是你的世界中发生的任何事情。我们只会看到你想看到的东西。”
languages.original_text: "And I will be your guide on this journey. I will help you to enter the meditative state, to get to know yourself... Of course, that is if you let me. Immersing yourself in your soul is a deeply intimate process, but you will not be able to do it without me." {n}Yrliet thoughtfully brushes a strand of red hair away from her face.{/n} "And I promise you, elantach, that I will not judge you — you, your world, or anything that takes place inside it. We will see only what you want to see."

traits.locale_text: “在这场旅途中，我会成为引领你的向导。我会帮助你进入冥想状态，学习如何了解你自己……当然，假如你愿意的话。浸入灵魂是非常私密的行为，但如果没有我的帮助，你一个人是做不到的。”{n}伊莉耶特伸出手，拨开了垂到额前的一缕红发。{/n}“我答应你，外界人。我不会随意评判你和你的世界，或是你的世界中发生的任何事情。我们只会看到你想看到的东西。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Y yo te guiaré en este viaje. Te ayudaré a entrar en el trance meditativo, a conocerte a ti {mf|mismo|misma}... si me dejas, claro. Sumergirte en tu propia alma es un proceso sumamente íntimo, pero no serás capaz de hacerlo sin mí». {n}Yrliet se aparta un mechón de pelo rojo del rostro con aire pensativo.{/n} «Y te prometo, elantach, que no te juzgaré; ni a ti, ni a tu mundo interior, ni nada de lo que ocurra en él. Solo veremos lo que tú quieras ver».
languages.original_text: "And I will be your guide on this journey. I will help you to enter the meditative state, to get to know yourself... Of course, that is if you let me. Immersing yourself in your soul is a deeply intimate process, but you will not be able to do it without me." {n}Yrliet thoughtfully brushes a strand of red hair away from her face.{/n} "And I promise you, elantach, that I will not judge you — you, your world, or anything that takes place inside it. We will see only what you want to see."

traits.locale_text: «Y yo te guiaré en este viaje. Te ayudaré a entrar en el trance meditativo, a conocerte a ti {mf|mismo|misma}... si me dejas, claro. Sumergirte en tu propia alma es un proceso sumamente íntimo, pero no serás capaz de hacerlo sin mí». {n}Yrliet se aparta un mechón de pelo rojo del rostro con aire pensativo.{/n} «Y te prometo, elantach, que no te juzgaré; ni a ti, ni a tu mundo interior, ni nada de lo que ocurra en él. Solo veremos lo que tú quieras ver».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Et je serai votre guide dans ce voyage. Je vous aiderai à entrer dans un état méditatif, à apprendre à vous connaître... Si vous le souhaitez, évidemment. S'immerger dans son âme est un acte très intime, mais vous ne serez pas capable d'y arriver sans mon aide. » {n}Yrliet repousse délicatement une mèche rousse tombée en travers de son visage.{/n} « Je vous le promets, elantach : je n'émettrai aucun jugement, que ce soit sur vous, sur votre monde ou ce qui pourrait s'y dérouler. Nous ne verrons que ce que vous souhaitez voir. »
languages.original_text: "And I will be your guide on this journey. I will help you to enter the meditative state, to get to know yourself... Of course, that is if you let me. Immersing yourself in your soul is a deeply intimate process, but you will not be able to do it without me." {n}Yrliet thoughtfully brushes a strand of red hair away from her face.{/n} "And I promise you, elantach, that I will not judge you — you, your world, or anything that takes place inside it. We will see only what you want to see."

traits.locale_text: « Et je serai votre guide dans ce voyage. Je vous aiderai à entrer dans un état méditatif, à apprendre à vous connaître... Si vous le souhaitez, évidemment. S'immerger dans son âme est un acte très intime, mais vous ne serez pas capable d'y arriver sans mon aide. » {n}Yrliet repousse délicatement une mèche rousse tombée en travers de son visage.{/n} « Je vous le promets, elantach : je n'émettrai aucun jugement, que ce soit sur vous, sur votre monde ou ce qui pourrait s'y dérouler. Nous ne verrons que ce que vous souhaitez voir. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Und ich werde auf dieser Reise Eure Führerin sein. Ich werde Euch helfen, in einem meditativen Status zu gelangen, Euch selbst kennenzulernen ... Natürlich nur, wenn Ihr es zulasst. In Eure Seele einzudringen, ist ein sehr intimer Vorgang, aber ohne mich werdet Ihr das nicht schaffen." {n}Yrliet streicht sich nachdenklich eine rote Haarsträhne aus dem Gesicht.{/n} "Und ich verspreche Euch, Elantach, dass ich nicht über Euch urteilen werde – nicht über Euch, Eure Welt oder alles, was sich darin abspielt. Wir werden nur sehen, was Ihr sehen wollt."
languages.original_text: "And I will be your guide on this journey. I will help you to enter the meditative state, to get to know yourself... Of course, that is if you let me. Immersing yourself in your soul is a deeply intimate process, but you will not be able to do it without me." {n}Yrliet thoughtfully brushes a strand of red hair away from her face.{/n} "And I promise you, elantach, that I will not judge you — you, your world, or anything that takes place inside it. We will see only what you want to see."

traits.locale_text: "Und ich werde auf dieser Reise Eure Führerin sein. Ich werde Euch helfen, in einem meditativen Status zu gelangen, Euch selbst kennenzulernen ... Natürlich nur, wenn Ihr es zulasst. In Eure Seele einzudringen, ist ein sehr intimer Vorgang, aber ohne mich werdet Ihr das nicht schaffen." {n}Yrliet streicht sich nachdenklich eine rote Haarsträhne aus dem Gesicht.{/n} "Und ich verspreche Euch, Elantach, dass ich nicht über Euch urteilen werde – nicht über Euch, Eure Welt oder alles, was sich darin abspielt. Wir werden nur sehen, was Ihr sehen wollt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「そして、我がこの旅のガイドになろう。お前が瞑想状態に入り、自分自身を知る手助けをする。もちろん、それはお前が我に任せてくれるのならばの話だが。魂に没入にするという行為は深く親密なものだが、我なしにはできないだろう」{n}ユリエットは思慮深げに、顔にかかる赤い髪の束を払いのけた。{/n}「そして約束しよう、エランタ、我はお前を裁かない…お前やお前の世界、あるいはその中で起こることを。お前が見たいものだけを見ることにしよう」
languages.original_text: "And I will be your guide on this journey. I will help you to enter the meditative state, to get to know yourself... Of course, that is if you let me. Immersing yourself in your soul is a deeply intimate process, but you will not be able to do it without me." {n}Yrliet thoughtfully brushes a strand of red hair away from her face.{/n} "And I promise you, elantach, that I will not judge you — you, your world, or anything that takes place inside it. We will see only what you want to see."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、我がこの旅のガイドになろう。お前が瞑想状態に入り、自分自身を知る手助けをする。もちろん、それはお前が我に任せてくれるのならばの話だが。魂に没入にするという行為は深く親密なものだが、我なしにはできないだろう」{n}ユリエットは思慮深げに、顔にかかる赤い髪の束を払いのけた。{/n}「そして約束しよう、エランタ、我はお前を裁かない…お前やお前の世界、あるいはその中で起こることを。お前が見たいものだけを見ることにしよう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bu macerada kılavuzun ben olacağım. Kendini tanıman için meditatif bir hâle bürünmene yardımcı olacağım. Tabii izin verirsen... Kendini ruhuna bırakmak, oldukça özel bir işlemdir ama ben olmadan başarman mümkün değil." {n}Yrliet, düşünceli bir tavırla yüzüne düşen bir parça kızıl saçı arkaya atıyor.{/n} "Seni yargılamayacağıma söz veriyorum elantach. Seni, senin dünyanı ya da içinde bulunan herhangi bir şeyi. Sadece senin görmek istediğin şeyleri göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: "And I will be your guide on this journey. I will help you to enter the meditative state, to get to know yourself... Of course, that is if you let me. Immersing yourself in your soul is a deeply intimate process, but you will not be able to do it without me." {n}Yrliet thoughtfully brushes a strand of red hair away from her face.{/n} "And I promise you, elantach, that I will not judge you — you, your world, or anything that takes place inside it. We will see only what you want to see."

Kendini ruhuna bırakmak, oldukça özel bir işlemdir ama ben olmadan başarman mümkün değil." {n}Yrliet, düşünceli bir tavırla yüzüne düşen bir parça kızıl saçı arkaya atıyor.{/n} "Seni yargılamayacağıma söz veriyorum elantach. Seni, senin dünyanı ya da içinde bulunan herhangi bir şeyi. Sadece senin görmek istediğin şeyleri göreceğiz."
